## Description {#details}

Verifier for <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu">AMDGPU</a> HSA metadata.

Operates in two modes:

In strict mode, metadata must already be well-typed.

In non-strict mode, metadata is coerced into expected types when possible.

Definition at line 44 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/binaryformat/amdgpumetadataverifier-h">AMDGPUMetadataVerifier.h</a>.
